content: crochet this beautiful willow wall hanging to add some visual interest to your space the neutral colours make this piece warm and inviting while drawing attention to the beautiful stitches this wall hanging uses less than 1 skein of yarn so it s a great budget-friendly project it s also really pretty need i say more it is made using the puff double_crochet and front post double_crochet to create tons of texture > **buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout ** skill level advanced beginner/intermediate * 1 skein budget friendly project * designed to fit a 17 - 18 dowel * any medium 4 worsted weight yarn can be used 250 - 300 yds * photo tutorials are included along with step-by-step pictures to help you along the way * it measures 15 5 wide by 19 5 long * it uses the puff and double_crochet stitch to create tons of texture and visual interest * it s a fun and quick project that will take you less than a day to make > find the free version of the willow wall hanging here 1 **the printable pdf is a total of 12 pages including the cover page photo tutorials and step-by-step photos to help you along the way ** 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-willow-wall-hanging/
